original_title: The Ocean - Relax And Be Free
overview: Filmed on a lonely beach at the baltic coast of Dahme, Germany. Starting at dawn. Using a fixed camera setting. No music. Just listen to the sound and see the film of nature, the seeshore, the Ocean. Relax And Be Free.
tagline: Listen to the sound and see the film of nature, the seeshore, the Ocean. Relax And Be Free.
title: The Ocean - Relax And Be Free
